text: Odd Solli (8 August 1924 - 29 March 2007) was a Norwegian bobsledder. He was born in Stabekk. He competed at the 1956 Winter Olympics in Cortina d'Ampezzo, where he placed 20th in men's two, together with Arne Røgden, and 11th in men's four. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2007 deaths Category:People from Bærum Category:Norwegian male bobsledders Category:Olympic bobsledders of Norway Category:Bobsledders at the 1956 Winter Olympics
title: Odd Solli
